entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 04:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.0°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
